title: Wrath Potion
summaries: The Wrath Potion is a buff potion which grants the Wrath buff when consumed. The buff increases damage done with weapons by 10%. This lasts for 4 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version] [img:Legacy tModLoader version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Console version] [img:Old-gen console version]), by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]), or by canceling the buff from the buffs screen ([img:Nintendo 3DS version]). It appears to be the Corruption variant of the Rage Potion.

This potion can only be crafted in worlds with Corruption due to it requiring the Ebonkoi, although it is possible to make an artificial Corruption biome in a Crimson world by importing either Corruption blocks, Purple Solution, or Corrupt Seeds.

As of version 1.4.0.1, it is possible to naturally acquire a Wrath Potion in a Crimson world by purchasing Corrupt Seeds from the Dryad in a Hardmode Graveyard biome, and using the Corrupt Seeds to make an artificial Corruption biome to fish in.
